}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== 2x3:2 MIMO
"1244-00000505-01Z" is silkscreened on the board.
The FCC test report lists the following items as identical... *PCI GW-DS300N ([[Planex GW-DS300N]]) *OvisLink AirLive MU5000PCI *Sitecom WL-181v1 *MINITAR MWNPC *MSI PC70SE *Topcom Skyr@cer PCI 2201n *JAHT WN-7300NI *Planet WNL-9320
